attributes.title: Worst app ever
attributes.review: When I downloaded this app it kept asking for all my information and said that it was taking it and saving it. Then I kept seeing pictures of nudes on my phone as if they were leaking other peoples. Please don’t download this app and give it a 1 star.

attributes.title: horrible. Do NOT download.
attributes.review: This app made my phone glitch, die faster, it was so bad. I downloaded to see reasons to vote for trumpet again but this just made my phone really bug and I couldn’t use it for one day! Try it out yourself.. you’ll be sorry! I’m so angry right now.

attributes.title: This app is horrible!!
attributes.review: It took me forever to download and when i enter into the app it is really glitchy and laggy. I cant do much with the app and it seems extremely pointless. The graphics are horrible and it took me atleast 20 tries to make an account.

attributes.title: Crashed my Phone!!
attributes.review: This app took forever to download and when it finally did, it took up so much storage that my phone crashed!!! I had to wait a week until my phone was back to normal. Definitely do not recommend!!

attributes.title: TERRIBLE
attributes.review: i downloaded the app because i wanted to keep up with everything he was doing but it kept sending me tanning salons to go too, and giving me the best places to get a wig, i’m very disappointed with how this app works, it is obnoxious and the tanning salons aren’t even that good 🤮🤮 please remove this app.
